Class tripleplay.anim.Animator

Removed Methods
Action setAnimating(Value<Boolean>, boolean) Sets a boolean value to true or false, usually to simplify the enabling/disabling of UI components during an animation.
 

Added Methods
void clear() Clears out any pending animations.
Action increment(Value<Integer>, int) Increments (or decrements if {@code amount} is negative} an int value.
Action setValue(Value<T>, T) Sets a value to the supplied constant.
Shake shake(Layer) Creates a shake animation on the specified layer.
Action stop(Playable) Stops the supplied clip or loop.
One tweenVolume(Playable) Tweens the volumne of the supplied playable.
 

Changed Methods
Action play(Playable) Change in signature from Copy to Playable.
 Plays the supplied clip or loop.
